name: DecomposeBeam
description: Extracts main geometric characteristics of a Beam.

inputParameters.name: show_frame
inputParameters.description: If True, shows the Beam's frame.

inputParameters.name: show_faces
inputParameters.description: If True, shows the Beam's faces with their indices and normals

outputParameters.name: Frame
outputParameters.description: A plane (frame) representing the Beam's local coordinate system.

outputParameters.name: Box
outputParameters.description: Box representing the original shape of the Beam.

outputParameters.name: Width
outputParameters.description: The width of the Beam's cross-section.

outputParameters.name: Height
outputParameters.description: The height of the Beam's cross-section.
